title: Episode #52: What is the Mind-Brain Connection?
description:
The principle of the mind-brain connection is fundamental to all my work, books, teachings, and talks therefore it's important to understand how it works.
In this podcast I break down the difference between the mind and brain, how they work, and why it is important to understand this connection.
Link to register for my 2018 Conference: https://drleafconference.com
THINK LEARN SUCCEED: https://store.drleaf.com/products/think-learn-succeed-book
